answers.answer: Has your doctor talked to you about preclampsia?
No I go see him Thursday
Sounds like preemclampisa. I just had my son 3 days ago due to that. He is 3 weeks early but he is perfectly healthily. Keep your head up.

Thank u... I had contractions last night but due to me just moving and not having a Dr here.. They sent me home after two hours and had me follow up with this rude as Dr that I will not be going back to... And I just read up on that and I have all the signs.. Hands swole and shortness of breath.... If they take her now she will be three weeks early to.... I even had contractions this morning and a few hours ago.... I took a hot bath but I'm kinda still in pain... Think I will be giving my Dr a call RIGHT NOW....

You need to actually probably go to the emergency room. I had preeclampsia and I had to get induced at 36 weeks. My only symptom was high blood pressure. It's important you get medical attention asap in case you have preeclampsia
Thanks for the heads up ladies.... I just talked to my Dr and he told me to go in and get checked..... Glad I posted so that I was informed....
Good luck hope everything goes great
Well I got admitted.... Bp still unstable and I'm 1cm dialated...

question: Blood pressure been unstable these last few weeks....  From 149/91 159/110 to 177/111.... Lord help me.... 26 days left and can't come quick enough... I feel it all in my neck.... Swear I just wanna sleeeeeeeeeeppppppp...  Hulllll
title: bp high... i just wanna sleeeeepppp
